mapper.select: SELECT id,code,name,nickName,stationId,ownerId,ownerType,created,updateDt,longitude,latitude,state,memo,contents,creater,createrStation,param FROM (select ROW_NUMBER() Over(order by ${orderField} ) as rowNum, * from PointInfo where ${filter}) tb where rowNum between ${fromRecord} and ${toRecord}
mapper.update: update PointInfo set code=#{code}, name=#{name}, nickName=#{nickName}, stationId=#{stationId}, ownerId=#{ownerId}, ownerType=#{ownerType}, created=#{created}, updateDt=#{updateDt}, longitude=#{longitude}, latitude=#{latitude}, state=#{state}, memo=#{memo}, contents=#{contents}, creater=#{creater}, createrStation=#{createrStation}, param=#{param} where id=#{id}
